title: bhAram unnaiyE
sahitya:
bhAram unnaiyE sArumen muruganE pAril ennai ini paripAlikkum oru


anupallavi

  tIrum en tuyaram pUraNamAit-tolaiya tArakam Aghumun pEraruLait-tArum


caraNam    vIramODu viLangum pErupakAran verippAril Edu vElA unaippOlE
pOriTTu sIriya sUranaik-kUriTTu Eru mayilAkkina kAraNam un karuNaiyE
